# freeCancellationDate

**Instance Property**

The date before which you must cancel a deferred payment without incurring any cancellation charges.

## Declaration

```swift
var freeCancellationDate: Date? { get set }
```

## Discussion

If you set [doc://com.apple.passkit/documentation/PassKit/PKDeferredPaymentRequest/freeCancellationDate], you need to set [doc://com.apple.passkit/documentation/PassKit/PKDeferredPaymentRequest/freeCancellationDateTimeZone] as well.

## Describing a deferred payment

- **billingAgreement**: The localized billing agreement the framework displays to the user prior to payment authorization.
- **paymentDescription**: A description of the deferred payment.
- **freeCancellationDateTimeZone**: The time zone at the destination location of the payment.
